ygData.subject: Re: HighKeep Advice Needed
ygData.msgSnippet: Something strange must happen when one reaches level 20.  When I was that level I met an old ogre friend who was level 29.  He offered to help me get Elf Hide
ygData.messageBody:
Something strange must happen when one reaches level 20. When I was that
level I met an old ogre friend who was level 29. He offered to help me get
Elf Hide Gloves, by grouping with him and his fellow basher. The three of
us: 29, 29, 20... and I got fairly good experience in Guk with them.
Experience hadn't been my intention, but I was pleasantly surprised.

Roop




>From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
>
>Correct me if I'm wrong, but with a group of people that high up in level
>(up to 7 above you), isn't it true that you'd get very little to no
>experience from the fights? I remember when I was level 5 and my friend was
>level 9 and trying to help me out, I stopped getting experience when we
were
>grouped because he was 4 levels above me. I've heard that even when the
>levels are closer, the people with the higher levels get more experience
>than the lower levels regardless of who does the most damage. Of course if
>you were just there for the fun, it wouldn't matter - but I was just
curious
>if you got any experience from it.
